title: Fragment, 1700–50
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: Brussels style bobbin lace
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Fragment of Point d'Angleterre a Reseau with a design of a seated maiden flanked on either side by curving tree trunks. Fond: Droschel. Modes: fond de neige, portes.
